channel.title: How do i make npc's say if im online or offline?
channel.description: i tried in the npc handler and it just kept saying im offline when i was online??? anyone please help me

item.title: How do i make npc's say if im online or offline?
item.dc:creator: @P-K P-K
item.description:
@P-K wrote:

okay… im using this for my dark mage … u can just change the npc # and the text.

                                                  {

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Xzander”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Xzander is ONLINE!!”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Xzander is OFFLINE!!”;
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's say if im online or offline?
